LandingPageWelcome.title: The best way to split bills with friends
LandingPageWelcome.description: Start sharing experiences in a simple and intuitive way with the power of Gemini! Don't forget to <sendReport>report your experiences!</sendReport>

LandingPageHowToPayDebt.title: How to Pay a Debt?
LandingPageHowToPayDebt.card1Description: When you have active bills, they will be available for payment.

LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.title: How to Create a Debt?
LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.card1Description: Within Blitz Split, you can create groups where you and your friends' expenses will be concentrated.
LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.card2Description: When you create a group, you can invite your friends to join.
LandingPageHowToCreateDebt.card3Description: Now just register your bills to split between the group participants in the way you prefer!

DeleteAccount.title: How to delete your account
DeleteAccount.requestInstructions: To request the deletion of your account and data, please send an email to <email>appborarachar@gmail.com</email> with the subject "Account Deletion Request".
DeleteAccount.emailInstructions: In the email body, please include the following information:
DeleteAccount.emailInstruction: The email address associated with your account
DeleteAccount.confirmationInstruction: A brief confirmation that you want to delete your account and data
DeleteAccount.processingConfirmation: After we receive your request, we will process it as quickly as possible. You will receive a confirmation email when your account and data have been deleted.
DeleteAccount.dataRecoveryWarning: Please note that once your account is deleted, your data cannot be recovered.
DeleteAccount.contactInformation: If you have any questions, please contact us by email at <email>appborarachar@gmail.com</email>.
